Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class PlanningPhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Phase
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.IteratedPhase
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.PlanningPhase
public class PlanningPhase extends IteratedPhase
This class represents the game state in which a player must play an assistant card. It uses a ClockWiseIterator to cycle through all the players of the game, and keeps track of the already played assistants through the alreadyPicked attribute. After the current player plays an assistant card, another phase instance is created and the game evolves to a new state (another PlanningPhase or a StudentMovePhase).
See Also:
  • PreparePhase
  • StudentMovePhase
  • IteratedPhase
  • ClockWiseIterator

  • Constructor Details

    • PlanningPhase

      PlanningPhase(IteratedPhase prev, int currentIndex)
      Constructor that creates a new PlanningPhase given an IteratedPhase and an index representing the index inside the List<Player> of the current player to play this turn. It is used from a CloudPickPhase, after a game round has ended.
      Parameters:
      prev - the IteratedPhase to (partially) copy
      currentIndex - the index inside the list of players to choose an assistant

    • PlanningPhase

      PlanningPhase(PreparePhase prev)
      Constructor that creates a new PlanningPhase given a PreparePhase, used only for the first round. Because it is the first round and no assistants have been played yet, this constructor picks the starting player with a ClockWiseIterator instance.
      Parameters:
      prev - the previous PreparePhase instance

    • PlanningPhase

      PlanningPhase(PlanningPhase prev)
      Shallow copy constructor given the previous PlanningPhase.
      Parameters:
      prev - the previous PlanningPhase

    • PlanningPhase

      PlanningPhase(PlanningPhase prev, Player current)
      Constructor that returns a new PlanningPhase instance, given the one to (partially) copy and the current Player.
      Parameters:
      prev - the previous PlanningPhase instance
      current - the current Player to choose an assistant

    • playAssistant

      public Phase playAssistant(Player player, AssistantType assistant) throws InvalidPhaseUpdateException
      This method lets the given Player play the assistant card of his deck corresponding the AssistantType passed.
      Overrides:
      playAssistant in class Phase
      Parameters:
      player - a reference to a Player as returned by authorizePlayer
      assistant - the AssistantType to play
      Throws:
      InvalidPhaseUpdateException - if this assistant has already been played by another player in this round

    • refillClouds

      private void refillClouds()
      Helper method that populates all the clouds of the Table instance with students extracted from the Sack. If the Sack is empty, then the clouds are only partially filled for this turn.

    • canPlayOther

      private boolean canPlayOther(Player player, AssistantType type)
      Helper method that returns true if the specified Player cannot play an assistant of a different type of the specified AssistantType.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player to play an assistant
      type - the specified AssistantType
      Returns:
      true if and only if the player has only that assistant type in his deck
